code: import axios from'axios';export var asyncGetAllUsers=function asyncGetAllUsers(){return function(dispatch){axios.get('https://reqres.in/api/users?page=1').then(function(response){var result=response.data;if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(getAllUsers(result.data));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var getAllUsers=function getAllUsers(users){return{type:'GET_ALL_USERS',payload:users};};export var asyncGetUser=function asyncGetUser(id){return function(dispatch){axios.get("https://reqres.in/api/users/".concat(id)).then(function(response){var result=response.data;console.log(result);if(result.hasOwnProperty('errors')){alert(result.message);}else{dispatch(getUser(result.data));}}).catch(function(err){console.log(err.message);});};};export var getUser=function getUser(user){return{type:'GET_USER',payload:user};};
